Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in North Tamborine, Cedar Creek Lodges is in a national park and minutes from Thunderbird Park and Tamborine National Park Cedar Creek Section. This 4-star lodge is within close proximity of Tamborine National Park Knoll Section and Tamborine Mountain Distillery.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the guestrooms featuring refrigerators and microwaves. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Conveniences include phones, as well as separate sitting areas and coffee/tea makers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take in the views from a terrace and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access and wedding services.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at one of the lodge's 2 restaurants. Breakfast is available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
The front desk is staffed during limited hours. This lodge has 3 meeting rooms available for events. Free self parking is available onsite.
